Latest

How long is the list of things you want to do? If you're anything like me, that list has quite a few items on it. Get fit, get flexible, learn a language, learn to program, write a book, and conquer the world. It goes on. While ambition can be virtuous, ambition spread thin among several pursuits makes for little progress.
